short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automate filtering and sorting facebook marketplace search results.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Filtering and sorting Facebook marketplace search results. Only runs on the page after you 'search' for item.

NOTES:
Because Facebook marketplace runs on JavaScript, you may need to reload page if experiencing problems.
